oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An architecture for a distributed deductive database system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MOHANIA, MK
SARDA, NL
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: computer networks
deductive databases
distributed databases
knowledge based systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a three level architecture for a distributed deductive database system which extends the power of distributed database systems to include deductive capabilities. It allows both knowledge-based and data-based information to be shared by the sites of a computer network in order to process user queries. The benefits and the possible ways of segregating the rule base into different clusters are also discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: TENCON '93: Proceedings of the IEEE Region 10 Conference on Computer, Communication, Control and Power Engineering, Beijing, China, 19-21 Octomber 1993, 196-200
